title: Patch Notes
content:
k. Fixed one of Karlach's lines getting cut off prematurely when discussing the Supreme Tadpole. Made sure Shadowheart won't be wearing a helmet when she asks you what you think of her new hair. Kinda makes it difficult to give an opinion. Fixed a bug causing Wyll to lose his horns when talking to Hope in the House of Hope.
